title: About
text:
I’m studying Statistics and Data Science at UCLA and am pursuing a career in esports. Most recently, I worked on Apex Legends Esports tracking data analytics, producing content, covering socials, and coordinating partnerships. However, I’ve worked extensively in freelance video production for clients like Raidiant, Monkey Bubble, and Washington Justice (OWL) and interning for organizations like Counter Logic Gaming (LCS/FGC) and Philadelphia Fusion (OWL).




B.S. Statistics and Data Science  3.92 GPA  Sep 2021 - June 2025






Content and Socials Event Contractor  Jan 2025 - Feb 2025
Partnerships Intern  Jun 2024 - Sep 2024
Program Management Intern  Jun 2023 - Sep 2023



Video Production Intern  Oct 2022 - Apr 2023



Video Production Intern  Jun 2022 - Dec 2022
